content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Engage in the ultimate World War I arcade flight-shooter Red Baron® Arcade. Grab the flight stick of 20 historic WWI planes and battle countless enemies including huge zeppelins, powerful battleships and authentic WWI aircraft in over 36 varied levels. Fight against intense computer AI in the single player missions or wage war against 7 other aspiring “Aces” online.

• Fast paced, arcade-style, dog-fighting action brings the adrenaline-filled fracas right into your living room.
• 20 highly-detailed classic WWI aircraft help you relive the infamous clashes of the era.
• 36 challenging single player missions including zeppelin skirmishes, battleship encounters and relentless enemy squadrons.
• 3 exciting 8-Player online modes including Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch and Capture the Blimp.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
